sentences.en: A window set vertically into a small gable projecting from a sloping roof.
sentences.cn: 可使光线照进圆屋顶或拱顶的窗.

sentences.en: Architecture The edge of the tiling that projects over a roof gable.
sentences.cn: 山墙突瓦,檐口瓦,滴水瓦:突出在屋顶的山墙上的盖瓦的边缘.

sentences.en: Bridge built fire east gable, the main body of masonry structure, brick law a cis - 1 Ding.
sentences.cn: 东桥头建有防火山墙, 主体为砖石结构, 砖砌法为一顺一丁式.

sentences.en: Clark Gable gives an excellent performance in the movie Gone with the Wind.
sentences.cn: 克拉克盖博在电影乱世佳人中的表演非常出色.

sentences.en: Gable dominated the Hollywood box office for so many years they stopped counting.
sentences.cn: 盖博多年始终雄霸好莱坞票房榜首,以至于人们最终放弃了票房统计.

sentences.en: I am a Clark Gable nut : I have seen all his films.
sentences.cn: 我是 克拉克·盖博 的影迷,我看过他演的所有影片.

sentences.en: I don't like the ugly look of that hole in the gable.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢山墙上的那个难看的窟窿.

sentences.en: It has a dormer roof joining both gable ends.
sentences.cn: 带天窗的斜屋顶连接着两边的山墙。

sentences.en: Joan Crawford teamed with Gable eight times, more than any other actress.
sentences.cn: 与盖博搭档最多的是JoanCrawford,共8次, 超过任何其它女演员.

sentences.en: Several paintings are hanging on the gable walls of his house.
sentences.cn: 他家的房山上挂着几幅画.

sentences.en: She was even more popular than Clark Gable, Robert Taylor anf Gary Cooper.
sentences.cn: 她甚至比当时的当红明星克拉克·盖博, 罗伯特·泰勒和加利·库柏更有名.

sentences.en: The actor Clack Gable is excellent too.
sentences.cn: 男演员克拉克·盖布尔也很出色.

sentences.en: The edge of the tiling that projects over a roof gable.
sentences.cn: 一边有两个斜面的人字形屋顶.

sentences.en: The fashion of the gable end with attic window towards the street, came from Holland.
sentences.cn: 山形墙及朝街的阁楼窗是从荷兰传来的流行样式.

sentences.en: the gable end of the barn

words.tran_cn: 有山形墙的；人字板制作的；三角墙的
砌三角墙；形成三角墙（gable的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: n. [建]三角形屋顶；人字形屋顶

trans.tran_en: the upper end of a house wall where it joins with a sloping roof and makes a shape like a triangle

trans.tran_cn: 形成三角墙；形成三角形饰物
在…上砌三角墙；在…安装三角形饰物
